Class ConversationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • use_cases.ConversationManager

  • public class ConversationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A Use Case class for managing conversations.

        The constructor for ConversationManager
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • createConversation

        public java.util.UUID createConversation(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> participants,
                                         ConvoType type)
        Creates a new conversation and returns its ID, or returns the ID of an existing conversation.
        Parameters:
        participants - A list of participants for the conversation.
        type - The type of conversation, can be either 'DIRECT', 'EVENT', or 'ORGANIZER'.
        Returns:
        If no conversation with the participants exists, returns the UUID of a new conversation. Else, return the UUID of an existing conversation.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String content,
                        java.util.UUID sender,
                        java.util.UUID conversation)
        Sends a message by adding a new message object to an existing conversation.
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the message.
        sender - The ID for the user sending the message.
        conversation - The id for the conversation the message is being added to. Can be found with createConversation().

      • replyToConversation

        public void replyToConversation(java.lang.String content,
                                java.util.UUID sender,
                                int index)
        A method for replying (adding a message) to an existing conversation. Similar to send message but takes an index for its conversation parameter instead. Index must be valid.
        Parameters:
        content - Content of the reply
        sender - Sender of the reply
        index - Index of the conversation being replied to

      • findConversation

        public int findConversation(java.util.UUID id)
        Find a conversation INDEX given a UUID.
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the conversation being searched for.
        Returns:
        The index of the conversation. If no such conversation exists, returns -1.

      • getType

        public ConvoType getType(java.util.UUID id)

      • getAllConversations

        public java.util.List<Conversation> getAllConversations()
        Get arraylist of all conversations data available up to the point of the method being called/
        Returns:
        Arraylist of all conversations.

      • getConversationParticipants

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getConversationParticipants(int index)
        Gets a conversation's participants given its index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the conversation whose participants are requested
        Returns:
        A list of this conversation's participants.

      • getIdFromIndex

        public java.util.UUID getIdFromIndex(int index)
        Returns a conversation's Id given its index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the conversations whose Id is requested
        Returns:
        The UUID of the conversation with 'index'.

      • isValidConversationIndex

        public boolean isValidConversationIndex(int index)
        A method that checks whether 'index' is a valid index in allConversations
        Parameters:
        index - The index to be checked.
        Returns:
        Boolean of whether the index is valid.

      • setEventNameForConvo

        public void setEventNameForConvo(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> participantUUID,
                                 java.lang.String eventName)

      • getEventName

        public java.lang.String getEventName(java.util.UUID id)

      • getMessagesInfo

        public java.util.List<MessageInfo> getMessagesInfo(int index)
        A method that returns a list of MessageInfo objects carrying message information to the controller. Made for UserController.viewMessages()
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the conversation to retrieve message info from
        Returns:
        A list of MessageInfo objects
